alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 4:12AM CDT until March 30 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT ICING LIKELY TONIGHT INTO WEDNESDAY MORNING... .A complex storm system will develop over the Plains today, then shift across the area tonight through Thursday. The initial surge of precipitation moving out ahead of the storm will push across the area tonight into Wednesday morning. The precipitation will likely begin as a mix of snow, sleet and freezing rain, change to mainly freezing rain during the night, and then to just rain as temperatures edge above freezing Wednesday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations between one tenth and one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Langlade, Lincoln and Northern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 9 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. Ice building up on trees and power lines could result in some power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
